title: No LP awarded

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Recently won a game in ranked, to receive 0 LP from the win
Riot halp! 

https://gyazo.com/a92821a2d45671f866fbd0c915bcc65f

Link to match history and also ranked ladderboard to prove 0LP was awarded

replies.body: If that win put you into promos then it will show a 0LP gain. Was that the case?
